DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate the efficacy of a multimodal hand hygiene system in the intensive care unit environment and evaluate any impact on health care associated infections.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Body-worn Multimodal Hand Hygiene System. Impact on Health-Care Associated Infections
DOC.detailed_description: Deploy and utilize a novel body worn hand hygiene system that incorporates provider and group specific feedback allowing hand hygiene to occur directly within the patient environment. We hypothesize that by improving provider hand hygiene we will reduce health-care associated infection rates.
DOC.criteria: All ICU patients Patient is not in an ICU at our Institution
